casebody.data:
In the Matter of AMERICAN VENTURES, INC., Debtor. James C. GARNER and J. D. Anderson, Petitioners-Appellees, v. Walter E. MAURER, Jr., Trustee, American Ventures, Inc., Debtor, Respondent-Appellant. No. 71-3181. United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. April 5, 1972.

Before JOHN R. BROWN, Chief Judge, and BELL and SIMPSON, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM:

Affirmed. See Local Rule 211 and the opinion of the district court filed in this matter. In Matter of American Ventures, Inc., N.D.Ga.1971, 340 F.Supp. 279.

. See NLRB v. Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America, 5 Cir. 1970, 430 F.2d 966.
